channel.title: A new game mode + UI improvements
channel.description:
Hello, I will make this short and clear:
One thing that bothers me is when the UI (the textbox, the user list, the character photo, everything that's not the scenery in the back) disappears when it switches between night and day. It would be awesome if those wouldn't disappear and only the scene in the back goes black. It's annoying because when I have the list of roles open, and the day/night phase begins, it disappears for a brief moment of time. So the suggestion is to keep the UI elements rendered while keeping the scenery transition.
Another nice addition to this game would be (on top of the weekly suggested ranked mode), Chaos mode, which the game would have a little bit of everything.
